If love.filesystem.isFused is true, the path returned by this function can be passed to love.filesystem.mount, which will make the directory containing the main game (e.g. C:\Program Files\coolgame\) readable by love.filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 如果love.filesystem.isFused为true，则此函数返回的路径可以传递给love.filesystem.mount，这将使love.filesystem可以读取包含主游戏的目录（例如 C:\Program Files\coolgame\ ）。 。

trans-unit.source: If Relative Mode is enabled for the mouse, the dx and dy arguments of this callback will update but x and y are not guaranteed to.

trans-unit.source: If love.window.setMode has vsync equal to true, this function can't run more frequently than the refresh rate (e.g. 60 Hz), and will halt the program until ready if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 如果love.window.setMode有 vsync 等于 true ，这个功能不能比刷新率更频繁地运行（例如，60赫兹），并在必要时将暂停程序，直到准备。

trans-unit.source: If t.release is enabled, LÖVE uses the release error handler, which is sparse on information by default, and can, of course, be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 如果 t.release 启用，爱使用释放错误处理程序，这是稀疏的默认信息，并可以，当然，所覆盖。

trans-unit.source: If LuaJIT's FFI is used to populate the Data object via Data:getPointer and ffi.cast, this variant can be drastically more efficient than other methods of setting Mesh vertex data.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用LuaJIT的FFI通过Data：getPointer和ffi.cast填充Data对象，则与其他设置网格顶点数据的方法相比，此变体可以大大提高效率。

trans-unit.source: If a Mesh wasn't created with a custom vertex format, it will have 3 vertex attributes named VertexPosition, VertexTexCoord, and VertexColor. If vertex attributes with those names are attached to the SpriteBatch, it will override the SpriteBatch's sprite positions, texture coordinates, and sprite colors, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果未使用自定义顶点格式创建网格，则它将具有3个顶点属性，分别为 VertexPosition ， VertexTexCoord 和 VertexColor 。如果将具有这些名称的顶点属性附加到SpriteBatch，它将分别覆盖SpriteBatch的sprite位置，纹理坐标和sprite颜色。

trans-unit.source: If a Mesh with custom vertex attributes is used and one of the attributes is meant to be used as a color in a Shader, and the attribute isn't named "VertexColor".
trans-unit.target: 如果使用具有自定义顶点属性的网格，并且其中一个属性打算用作Shader中的颜色，并且该属性未命名为“ VertexColor”。

trans-unit.source: If a vertex map is used with the Mesh, this method will set a subset of the values in the vertex map array to use, instead of a subset of the total vertices in the Mesh.
trans-unit.target: 如果顶点图与网格一起使用，则此方法将设置要使用的顶点图数组中值的子集，而不是网格中总顶点的子集。

trans-unit.source: If a Shader is used which has uniform / extern variables or other variables that are meant to be used as colors, and Shader:sendColor isn't used.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的着色器具有统一/外部变量或其他打算用作颜色的变量，则不使用Shader：sendColor。

trans-unit.source: If a Mesh wasn't created with a custom vertex format, it will have 3 vertex attributes named VertexPosition, VertexTexCoord, and VertexColor.

trans-unit.source: If a Mesh wasn't created with a custom vertex format, it will have 3 vertex attributes named VertexPosition, VertexTexCoord, and VertexColor. Otherwise the attribute name must either match one of the vertex attributes specified in the vertex format when creating the Mesh, or must match a vertex attribute from another Mesh attached to this Mesh via Mesh:attachAttribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果未使用自定义顶点格式创建网格，则它将具有3个顶点属性，分别为 VertexPosition ， VertexTexCoord 和 VertexColor 。否则，属性名称必须与创建Mesh时以顶点格式指定的顶点属性之一匹配，或者必须与通过Mesh：attachAttribute附加到此Mesh的另一个Mesh的顶点属性匹配。

trans-unit.source: If a custom vertex attribute uses the name "VertexPosition", "VertexTexCoord", or "VertexColor", then the vertex data for that vertex attribute will be used for the standard vertex positions, texture coordinates, or vertex colors respectively, when drawing the Mesh. Otherwise a Vertex Shader is required in order to make use of the vertex attribute when the Mesh is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 如果自定义顶点属性使用名称“ VertexPosition”，“ VertexTexCoord”或“ VertexColor”，则在绘制网格时，该顶点属性的顶点数据将分别用于标准顶点位置，纹理坐标或顶点颜色。 。否则，在绘制网格时需要顶点着色器以利用顶点属性。

trans-unit.source: If a file called conf.lua is present in your game folder (or .love file), it is run
trans-unit.target: 如果您的游戏文件夹中存在一个名为 conf.lua 的文件（或.love文件），则它将运行

trans-unit.source: If a game is in fused mode, its save directory will be directly in the Appdata directory instead of Appdata/LOVE/. The game will also be able to load C Lua dynamic libraries which are located in the save directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个游戏处于融合模式,它的保存目录将直接在Appdata目录下,而不是Appdata/LOVE/。游戏也将能够加载位于保存目录中的C Lua动态库。

trans-unit.source: If a graphics driver's shader compiler determines that a uniform / extern variable doesn't affect the final output of the shader, it may optimize the variable out. This function will return false in that case.
trans-unit.target: 如果图形驱动程序的着色器编译器确定统一/外部变量不影响着色器的最终输出,它可能会优化变量输出。在这种情况下,该函数将返回false。

trans-unit.source: If false and the given effect name was previously enabled on this Source, disables the effect.

trans-unit.source: If relative mode is enabled, the cursor is hidden and doesn't move when the mouse does, but relative mouse motion events are still generated via love.mousemoved. This lets the mouse move in any direction indefinitely without the cursor getting stuck at the edges of the screen.

trans-unit.target: 如果分组和类别过滤没有产生一个碰撞决定,这个函数就会被调用两个固定物作为参数。这个函数应该返回一个布尔值,其中true表示灯具将碰撞,false表示它们将互相通过。

trans-unit.source: If the position to apply the force is not given, it will act on the center of mass of the body. The part of the force not directed towards the center of mass will cause the body to spin (and depends on the rotational inertia).
trans-unit.target: 如果没有给出施力的位置,它将作用在身体的质量中心。不指向质量中心的那部分力将导致身体旋转(并取决于旋转惯性)。

trans-unit.source: If the width and height is bigger than or equal to the desktop dimensions (this includes setting both to 0) and fullscreen is set to false, it will appear "visually" fullscreen, but it's not true fullscreen and love.window.getFullscreen will return false in this case. This also applies to love.window.updateMode as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果宽度和高度大于或等于桌面尺寸（包括将其都设置为0）且全屏设置为false，则它将“以视觉方式”显示为全屏，但不是真正的全屏，并且love.window.getFullscreen将返回在这种情况下为假。这也适用于love.window.updateMode。

trans-unit.source: If this is called it should be before love.graphics.print, Font:getWrap, and other Font methods which use glyph positioning information are called.

trans-unit.source: If true, mipmaps for the image will be automatically generated (or taken from the images's file if possible, if the image originated from a CompressedImageData). If this value is a table, it should contain a list of other filenames of images of the same format that have progressively half-sized dimensions, all the way down to 1x1. Those images will be used as this Image's mipmap levels.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则将自动生成图像的mipmap（如果可能，则从图像的文件中获取，如果图像源自CompressedImageData）。如果此值是一个表，则它应包含具有相同格式的图像的其他文件名列表，这些文件名的尺寸逐渐减小一半，一直到1x1。这些图像将用作该图像的mipmap级别。

trans-unit.source: If true, the returned formats will only be indicated as supported if love.graphics.newCanvas will work with the readable flag set to true for that format, and vice versa if the parameter is false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则只有在love.graphics.newCanvas将该格式的可读标志设置为true的情况下，才会将返回的格式表示为受支持，如果参数为false，则反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: If two fixtures are in the same group they either always collide if the group is positive, or never collide if it's negative. If the group is zero or they do not match, then the contact filter checks if the fixtures select a category of the other fixture with their masks. The fixtures do not collide if that's not the case. If they do have each other's categories selected, the return value of the custom contact filter will be used. They always collide if none was set.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个夹具在同一个组中,如果组是正的,它们总是碰撞,或者如果组是负的,它们从不碰撞。如果组是零或者它们不匹配,那么接触过滤器检查夹具是否用它们的掩模选择了另一个夹具的类别。如果不是这样的话,灯具就不会碰撞。如果它们确实选择了彼此的类别,那么将使用自定义接触过滤器的返回值。如果没有设置,它们总是碰撞。

trans-unit.source: If width or height is 0, setMode will use the width and height of the desktop.
trans-unit.target: 如果宽度或高度为0,setMode将使用桌面的宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: If you feel that finding the correct mass properties is tricky, then this function may be able to help you. After creating the needed shapes on the Body, a call to this function will set the mass properties based on those shapes. Remember to call this function after adding the shapes.
trans-unit.target: 如果你觉得寻找正确的质量属性很棘手,那么这个函数或许能够帮助你。在Body上创建需要的形状后,调用此函数将根据这些形状设置质量属性。记得在添加形状后调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: If you have disabled the window in conf.lua (i.e. t.window = false) and use this function to manually create the window, then you must not call any other love.graphics.* function before this one. Doing so will result in undefined behavior and/or crashes because OpenGL cannot function properly without a window.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已在conf.lua中禁用了该窗口（即 t.window = false ）并使用此功能手动创建了该窗口，则在此之前您不得调用任何其他love.graphics。*函数。这样做将导致不确定的行为和/或崩溃，因为OpenGL无法在没有窗口的情况下正常运行。

trans-unit.target: 立即将所有新的和修改的精灵数据发送到显卡上。

trans-unit.source: Implements a luasocket module for TCP/UDP networking. The luasocket module is bundled with love binary, but in order to use it, you need to require the module like this:
trans-unit.target: 为TCP / UDP网络实现luasocket模块。luasocket模块与love二进制文件捆绑在一起，但是要使用它，您需要像下面这样的模块：

trans-unit.source: In 0.7.2, when you don't have time to wait for garbage collection, this function may be used to free the object immediately.
trans-unit.target: 在0.7.2中,当你没有时间等待垃圾收集时,可以使用这个函数来立即释放对象。

trans-unit.source: In 0.10.0 and newer, the Image must be created with the mipmaps flag enabled for the mipmap filter to have any effect.
trans-unit.target: 在0.10.0及更高版本中，必须在启用了 mipmaps 标志的情况下创建 Image ，以使mipmap过滤器生效。

trans-unit.source: In 0.10.0 and newer, the texture must be created with the mipmaps flag enabled for the mipmap filter to have any effect. In versions prior to 0.10.0 it's best to call this method directly after creating the image with love.graphics.newImage, to avoid bugs in certain graphics drivers.
trans-unit.target: 在0.10.0及更高版本中，必须在启用 mipmaps 标志的情况下创建纹理，以使mipmap过滤器生效。在0.10.0之前的版本中，最好在使用love.graphics.newImage创建图像后直接调用此方法，以避免某些图形驱动程序中的错误。

trans-unit.source: In Android, the aspect ratio deducted from the width and the height is used to determine whetever the game run in landscape or portrait.
trans-unit.target: 在安卓系统中,从宽度和高度中扣除的长宽比被用来决定游戏是以横向还是纵向运行。

trans-unit.source: In Android, you have to make sure all threads are terminated before quitting/restarting, otherwise LOVE will fail to start again!
trans-unit.target: 在Android中，您必须确保所有线程在退出/重新启动之前都已终止，否则LOVE将无法再次启动！

trans-unit.source: In LÖVE 11.0, the passed arguments excludes the game name and the fused command-line flag (if exist) when runs from non-fused LÖVE executable. Previous version pass the argument as-is without any filtering.
trans-unit.target: 在LÖVE11.0中，从非融合的LÖVE可执行文件运行时，传递的参数排除游戏名称和融合的命令行标志（如果存在）。以前的版本按原样传递参数，而不进行任何过滤。

trans-unit.source: In LÖVE version 0.9.2 and earlier, errors in the config file will cause the game to not launch and no error message to appear. If the game doesn't load, check the config file for errors first. In version 0.10.2 and later, errors in the config will now show the blue error screen showing the error in the config file.
trans-unit.target: 在LÖVE0.9.2及更早版本中，配置文件中的错误将导致游戏无法启动，并且不会出现错误消息。如果游戏没有加载，请先检查配置文件中是否有错误。在0.10.2及更高版本中，配置中的错误现在将显示蓝色错误屏幕，其中显示配置文件中的错误。

trans-unit.source: In LÖVE version 0.8.0, the love._os string contains the current operating system.
trans-unit.target: 在LÖVE版本0.8.0中，love._os字符串包含当前操作系统。

trans-unit.source: In LÖVE versions prior to 0.10.0, these constants are all lower-case.
trans-unit.target: 在之前的版本LÖVE 0.10.0，这些常量都是小写。

trans-unit.source: In Windows the taskbar icon will flash, and in OS X the dock icon will bounce.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows中,任务栏图标会闪烁,而在OS X中,dock图标会跳动。

trans-unit.source: In addition to compressed image formats, the following formats are supported:
trans-unit.target: 除压缩图像格式外，还支持以下格式：

trans-unit.source: In both cases, love.math.gammaToLinear can be used to convert color values to linear RGB in Lua code, or the gammaCorrectColor (or unGammaCorrectColor if necessary) shader functions can be used inside shader code. Those shader functions
trans-unit.target: 在两种情况下，love.math.gammaToLinear可用于转换颜色值到线性RGB中Lua代码，或 gammaCorrectColor （或 unGammaCorrectColor 着色器功能可以着色器代码内使用如有必要）。那些着色器功能

trans-unit.source: In exclusive fullscreen mode, if a window size is used which does not match one of the monitor's supported display modes, the window will be resized to the next largest display mode.
trans-unit.target: 在独占全屏模式下,如果使用的窗口大小与显示器支持的显示模式之一不匹配,则窗口将被调整为下一个最大的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: In general, rgba8, rgba4, and rgb5a1 are supported everywhere. rgb10a2 is also supported everywhere on desktop platforms.
trans-unit.target: 通常，到处都支持 rgba8 ， rgba4 和 rgb5a1 。桌面平台上的任何地方也都支持 rgb10a2 。

trans-unit.source: In general, colors chosen based on what they look like on-screen are already in gamma-space and should not be double-converted. Colors calculated using math are often in the linear RGB space.
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,根据屏幕上的外观选择的颜色已经在伽马空间,不应该进行双重转换。用数学计算出来的颜色往往在线性RGB空间。

trans-unit.source: In many cases, you draw images or shapes in terms of their upper-left corner (See the picture above).
trans-unit.target: 在许多情况下,你画图像或形状的左上角(见上图)。

trans-unit.source: In order to use an Array Texture or other non-2D texture types as the main texture in a custom Shader, the void effect() variant must be used in the pixel shader, and MainTex must be declared as an ArrayImage or sampler2DArray like so: uniform ArrayImage MainTex;.
trans-unit.target: 为了在自定义使用数组纹理或其它非2D纹理类型作为主纹理着色器，所述空效应（）变体必须在像素着色器中使用，并且MAINTEX必须被声明为一个ArrayImage或sampler2DArray像这样： uniform ArrayImage MainTex; 。

trans-unit.source: In the context of love threads, a flat table is understood to not contain tables, functions, userData or a metatable.
trans-unit.target: 在爱线程的上下文中,平表被理解为不包含表、函数、userData或metatable。

trans-unit.source: In version 0.8.0 and older, love.graphics.print stops at the first '\0' (null) character. This can bite you if you are appending keystrokes to form your string, as some of those are multi-byte unicode characters which will likely contain null bytes.
trans-unit.target: 在0.8.0和更早的版本中,love.graphics.print在第一个'/0'(null)字符处停止。如果你在添加按键来形成字符串,这可能会影响到你,因为其中一些是多字节的unicode字符,很可能包含null字节。

trans-unit.source: In version 0.9.2, a bug caused this function to reset all transformations. It was fixed in 0.10.0. A workaround for 0.9.2 would be to use a combination of rotating and scaling to imitate shearing.
trans-unit.target: 在0.9.2版中，有一个错误导致此函数重置所有转换。它固定在0.10.0中。0.9.2的解决方法是结合使用旋转和缩放来模拟剪切。

trans-unit.source: In version 0.9.2 and earlier this is represented by the actual space character ' '.
trans-unit.target: 在0.9.2及更早版本中，这由实际的空格字符''表示。

trans-unit.source: In version 0.9.2 and earlier, wrapping was implemented by breaking up words by spaces and putting them back together to make sure things fit nicely within the limit provided. However, due to the way this is done, extra spaces between words would end up missing when printed on the screen, and some lines could overflow past the provided wrap limit. In version 0.10.0 and newer this is no longer the case.
trans-unit.target: 在0.9.2及更早版本中，通过用空格将单词分开并将它们放回一起以确保内容在所提供的限制范围内完全合适来实现包装。但是，由于这样做的原因，在屏幕上打印时，单词之间的多余空格最终会丢失，并且某些行可能会超出所提供的换行限制。在0.10.0及更高版本中，情况不再如此。

trans-unit.source: In version 0.9.2 and older, the global color set with love.graphics.setColor will not work on the SpriteBatch if any of the sprites has its own color.
trans-unit.target: 在0.9.2和更早版本中，如果任何sprite具有自己的颜色，则使用love.graphics.setColor设置的全局颜色将不适用于SpriteBatch。

trans-unit.source: In versions prior to 0.10.0 it was named CompressedData, however that name is used for something else now.
trans-unit.target: 在0.10.0之前的版本中，其名称为CompressedData，但是现在该名称用于其他用途。

trans-unit.source: In versions prior to 0.10.0 it's best to call this method directly after creating the image with love.graphics.newImage, to avoid bugs in certain graphics drivers.
trans-unit.target: 在0.10.0之前的版本中，最好在使用love.graphics.newImage创建图像后直接调用此方法，以避免某些图形驱动程序中的错误。

trans-unit.source: In versions prior to 0.10.0 the CompressedData name was used for CompressedImageData objects.
trans-unit.target: 在0.10.0之前的版本中，CompressedData名称用于CompressedImageData对象。

trans-unit.source: In versions prior to 0.10.0 the width of the separator area after a particular font glyph sets the amount of space that goes after the glyph. As of 0.10.0, it is possible to add negative spacing for all characters by using the 3-parameter version of love.graphics.newImageFont and giving a negative number as the third parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在0.10.0之前的版本中，特定字体字形后的分隔符区域的宽度设置了字形后的空间量。从0.10.0开始，可以通过使用love.graphics.newImageFont的3参数版本并为第三个参数提供负数来为所有字符添加负间距。

trans-unit.source: In versions prior to 0.10.0, calling this function automatically creates mipmaps for the Image if none exist yet. If the image is compressed and its CompressedData has mipmap data included, it will use that.
trans-unit.target: 在0.10.0之前的版本中，如果尚不存在，则调用此函数会自动为Image创建mipmap。如果图像被压缩，并且其CompressedData包含mipmap数据，它将使用该图像。

trans-unit.source: In versions prior to 0.10.0, not all graphics cards that LÖVE supported could use Canvases. love.graphics.isSupported("canvas") could be used to check for support at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 在0.10.0之前的版本中，并非LÖVE支持的所有图形卡都可以使用画布。love.graphics.isSupported（“ canvas”）可用于在运行时检查支持。

trans-unit.source: In versions prior to 0.10.0, this function clears the screen to the currently set background color instead.
trans-unit.target: 在0.10.0之前的版本中，此功能改为将屏幕清除为当前设置的背景色。

trans-unit.source: In versions prior to 0.9.0, LÖVE expects ISO 8859-1 encoding for the glyphs string.
trans-unit.target: 在0.9.0之前的版本中，LÖVE希望字形字符串使用ISO 8859-1编码。

trans-unit.source: In versions prior to 11.0, color and byte component values were within the range of 0 to 255 instead of 0 to 1.
trans-unit.target: 在11.0之前的版本中，颜色和字节分量值的范围是0到255，而不是0到1。

trans-unit.source: In versions prior to 11.0, color component values were within the range of 0 to 255 instead of 0 to 1.
trans-unit.target: 在11.0之前的版本中，颜色分量值在0到255的范围内，而不是0到1。

trans-unit.target: 按住一个键时增加一个值

trans-unit.source: Increase a value while the right mouse button is held
trans-unit.target: 按住鼠标右键时增加一个值

trans-unit.source: Increase the point size by 1 and set it to smooth.
trans-unit.target: 将点的大小增加1,并设置为平滑。

trans-unit.target: 通过使用love.graphics.setPointSize将点大小增加1 。

trans-unit.source: Increase the point size by 1, by using love.graphics.getPointSize.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用love.graphics.getPointSize将点大小增加1 。

Initialize a static spritebatch with sprites and immediately send the data to the graphics card
trans-unit.target: 用精灵初始化一个静态的spriteebatch,并立即将数据发送到显卡。

trans-unit.target: 初始化love.filesystem,将在内部调用,所以不应明确使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes love.filesystem, will be called internally, so should not be used explictly.
trans-unit.target: 初始化love.filesystem,将在内部调用,所以不应该被明确地使用。

trans-unit.source: Insert control point after the i-th control point.
trans-unit.target: 在第i个控制点后插入控制点。

trans-unit.source: Insert control point after the i-th control point. Indices start with 1. Negative indices wrap around: -1 is the last control point, -2 the one before the last, etc.
trans-unit.target: 在第i-th个控制点之后插入控制点。负指数从1开始,负指数环绕:-1是最后一个控制点,-2是最后一个控制点之前的控制点,等等。

trans-unit.source: Insert control point as the new i-th control point. Existing control points from i onwards are pushed back by 1. Indices start with 1. Negative indices wrap around: -1 is the last control point, -2 the one before the last, etc.
trans-unit.target: 插入控制点作为新的第i个控制点。从第i个控制点开始,现有的控制点往后推1,指数从1开始,负指数环绕:-1是最后一个控制点,-2是前一个控制点,等等。

trans-unit.source: Insert key
Instancing is not supported by some older GPUs that are only capable of using OpenGL ES 2 or OpenGL 2. Use love.graphics.getSupported to check.
trans-unit.target: 一些只能使用OpenGL ES 2或OpenGL 2的较旧的GPU不支持实例化。请使用love.graphics.getSupported进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using this function, consider using a BMFont generator such as bmfont, littera, or bmGlyph with love.graphics.newFont. Because slime said it was better.
trans-unit.target: 代替使用此功能，可以考虑将BMFont生成器（如bmfont，littera或bmGlyph）与love.graphics.newFont 一起使用。因为粘液说更好。

trans-unit.source: Integer number representing the higher 32 bits of the RandomGenerator's 64 bit seed value.
trans-unit.target: 整数,代表RandomGenerator的64位种子值的高32位。

trans-unit.source: Integer number representing the higher 32 bits of the random number generator's 64 bit seed value.
trans-unit.target: 整数,代表随机数发生器64位种子值的高32位。

trans-unit.source: Integer number representing the lower 32 bits of the RandomGenerator's 64 bit seed value.
trans-unit.target: 整数,代表RandomGenerator的64位种子值的低32位。

Interval in milliseconds to measure lowest mean RTT.
trans-unit.target: 以毫秒为单位的时间间隔，用于测量最低的平均RTT。

Inverse distance attenuation.
Inverse distance attenuation. Gain is clamped. In version 0.9.2 and older this is named inverse clamped.
trans-unit.target: 反距离衰减。增益被钳位。在0.9.2和更早的版本中，这称为“ 反向钳位”。

trans-unit.source: It also recognizes any SDL gamecontroller mapping string, such as those created with Steam's Big Picture controller configure interface, or this nice database.
trans-unit.target: 它还可以识别任何SDL gamecontroller映射字符串，例如使用Steam的Big Picture控制器configure接口创建的字符串，或该不错的数据库。

trans-unit.source: It also recognizes any SDL gamecontroller mapping string, such as those created with Steam's Big Picture controller configure interface, or this nice database. If a new mapping is loaded for an already known controller GUID, the later version will overwrite the one currently loaded.
trans-unit.target: 它还可以识别任何SDL gamecontroller映射字符串，例如使用Steam的Big Picture控制器configure接口创建的字符串，或该不错的数据库。如果为已知的控制器GUID加载了新的映射，则更高版本将覆盖当前加载的控制器。

trans-unit.source: It can't draw the videos, see love.graphics.newVideo and Video objects for that.
trans-unit.target: 它无法绘制视频，请参见love.graphics.newVideo和Video对象。

trans-unit.source: It does a few useful things:
trans-unit.target: 它可以做一些有用的事情。

trans-unit.target: 从0.9.2版本开始，它会自动发生。如果绝对必要，请使用SpriteBatch：flush。

trans-unit.source: It happens automatically since version 0.9.2. Use SpriteBatch:flush if absolutely necessary..

trans-unit.source: LÖVE provides several useful Shader Variables by default. Additionally, LÖVE exposes a function VideoTexel(uv) which yields the color value of the currently drawn video at that position. Since Videos are drawn as YUV data in multiple textures, and then converted in the shader, the Texel function cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，LÖVE提供了几个有用的着色器变量。此外，LÖVE还公开了 VideoTexel(uv) 函数，该函数可产生该位置当前绘制的视频的颜色值。由于视频是在多个纹理中作为YUV数据绘制的，然后在着色器中进行转换，因此无法使用Texel函数。

trans-unit.source: LÖVE shader language
LÖVE will call this function internally as needed when most state is changed, so it is not necessary to manually call it.
trans-unit.target: 当大多数状态更改时，LÖVE将根据需要在内部调用此函数，因此无需手动调用它。

trans-unit.source: LÖVE's coordinate system is rooted in the upper-left corner of the screen, which is at location (0, 0). The x axis is horizontal: larger values are further to the right. The y axis is vertical: larger values are further towards the bottom.
trans-unit.target: LÖVE的坐标系植根于屏幕的左上角，即位置（0，0）。x轴是水平的：更大的值在右边。y轴是垂直的：更大的值朝向底部。

trans-unit.source: LÖVE's coordinate system is rooted in the upper-left corner of the screen, which is at location (0, 0). The x axis is horizontal: larger values are further to the right. The y axis is vertical: larger values are further towards the bottom. It is worth noting that the location (0, 0) aligns with the upper-left corner of the pixel as well, meaning that for some functions you may encounter off-by-one problems in the render output when drawing 1 pixel wide lines. You can try aligning the coordinate system with the center of pixels rather than their upper-left corner. Do this by passing x+0.5 and y+0.5 or using love.graphics.translate().
trans-unit.target: LÖVE的坐标系植根于屏幕的左上角，即位置（0，0）。 x轴是水平的：更大的值在右边。 y轴是垂直的：更大的值朝向底部。值得注意的是，位置（0，0）也与像素的左上角对齐，这意味着对于某些功能，当绘制1个像素宽的线时，渲染输出中可能会遇到一对一的问题。您可以尝试将坐标系与像素中心而不是像素的左上角对齐。通过传递x + 0.5和y + 0.5或使用love.graphics.translate（）来执行此操作。

Mobile operating systems may forcefully kill the game if it uses too much memory, so any non-critical resource should be removed if possible (by setting all variables referencing the resources to nil), when this event is triggered. Sounds and images in particular tend to use the most memory.

Sounds and images in particular tend to use the most memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果游戏使用了太多的内存,移动操作系统可能会强制杀死游戏,所以当这个事件被触发时,如果可能的话,应该删除任何非关键资源(通过将所有引用资源的变量设置为nil,并调用collectgarbage())。特别是声音和图像往往会使用最多的内存。

trans-unit.source: Object:release
Object:type
Object:typeOf

Objects are drawn relative to their local coordinate system. The origin is by default located at the top left corner of Image and Canvas. All scaling, shearing, and rotation arguments transform the object relative to that point. Also, the position of the origin can be specified on the screen coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 相对于其局部坐标系绘制对象。默认情况下，原点位于Image和Canvas的左上角。所有缩放，剪切和旋转参数都将相对于该点转换对象。另外，可以在屏幕坐标系上指定原点的位置。

trans-unit.source: Objects will always be drawn. Effectively disables the depth or stencil test.
trans-unit.target: 对象将始终被绘制。有效地禁用深度或钢网测试。

trans-unit.source: Objects will never be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 对象永远不会被画出来。

Official documentation for lua-enet is available here. ENet's features are listed on its homepage. The official documentation may have typos. The documentation on this wiki reflects Löve's implementation, meaning it should be safe to follow what's written here.
trans-unit.target: lua-enet的官方文档在此处。ENet的功能列在其主页上。官方文档可能有错别字。该Wiki上的文档反映了Löve的实现，这意味着可以安全地遵循此处的内容。

trans-unit.source: Ogg Vorbis (.ogg, .oga, .ogv)
Older Linux distributions that ship with older OpenAL library may not support audio effects. Furthermore, iOS doesn't support audio effects at all.
trans-unit.target: 旧的Linux发行版如果搭载了旧的OpenAL库,可能不支持音频效果。此外,iOS根本不支持音频效果。

trans-unit.source: Older Versions
Older and low-end systems do not always support all graphics extensions.
trans-unit.target: 旧的和低端的系统并不总是支持所有的图形扩展。

trans-unit.source: On *very* old graphics cards that don't support OpenGL 2.0, the wrapping results may be different for images with non-power-of-two sizes, because LÖVE will internally pad the image to the next power-of-two dimensions in that case.
trans-unit.target: 在*非常*不支持OpenGL 2.0的旧图形卡上，对于非2幂的尺寸的图像，包装结果可能会有所不同，因为LÖVE会在内部将图像填充到下一个2幂的尺寸。这种情况。

trans-unit.source: On Android and iOS, textinput is disabled by default; call love.keyboard.setTextInput to enable it.
trans-unit.target: 在Android和iOS上，默认情况下，textinput是禁用的；调用love.keyboard.setTextInput启用它。

trans-unit.source: On Android there are various save locations. If these don't work then you can use love.filesystem.getSaveDirectory() to check.
trans-unit.target: 在Android上，存在各种保存位置。如果这些方法不起作用，则可以使用 love.filesystem.getSaveDirectory() 进行检查。

trans-unit.source: On iOS and Android this variant tells the OS that the specified rectangle is where text will show up in the game, which prevents the system on-screen keyboard from covering the text.
trans-unit.target: 在iOS和Android上,这个变体告诉操作系统,指定的矩形是文字在游戏中的显示位置,这样可以防止系统的屏幕键盘覆盖文字。

trans-unit.source: On mobile devices (Android and iOS), the sharpness parameter is not supported and will do nothing. You can use a custom Shader instead, and specify the mipmap sharpness in the optional third parameter to the Texel function in the shader (a
trans-unit.target: 在移动设备（Android和iOS）上，不支持sharpness参数，并且不会执行任何操作。您可以改用自定义着色器，并在着色器中的 Texel 函数的第三个可选参数中指定mipmap清晰度。

trans-unit.source: On mobile devices, variables in pixel shaders use mediump (16 bit float) precision by default instead of 32 bit float, for performance reasons. This may cause numeric instability or visual artifacts for larger numbers. Use the highp qualifier when declaring a variable (for example highp float pos;) to make it use always 32 bit float precision. Furthermore, highp precision is not supported on all devices, particularly GLES2 devices. Use love.graphics.getSupported to check!
trans-unit.target: 在移动设备上，出于性能原因，默认情况下，像素着色器中的变量使用 mediump （16位浮点数）精度，而不是32位浮点数。对于较大的数字，这可能会导致数字不稳定或视觉失真。在声明变量（例如 highp float pos; ）时，请使用 highp 限定符，以使其始终使用32位浮点精度。此外， highp 精度不支持所有的设备，特别是GLES2设备。使用love.graphics.getSupported检查！

trans-unit.source: On some desktop systems this function may do nothing.
trans-unit.target: 在一些台式机系统上,这个功能可能什么都不做。

trans-unit.source: On touch devices, this shows the system's native on-screen keyboard when it's enabled.
trans-unit.target: 在触控设备上,启用后会显示系统的原生屏幕键盘。

One can free the port by calling its destroy method; nil-ing the host object and calling collectgarbage() would work as well, since :destroy calls host:__gc internally, but this is cleaner:
trans-unit.target: 我们可以通过调用 destroy 方法来释放 port;将 host 对象置零并调用 collectgarbage()也可以,因为 :destroy 在内部调用 host:__gc,但这样更干净。

trans-unit.source: One could use textinput or textedited instead, but those only give back the end result of keys used, i.e. you can't get modifiers on their own from it, only the final symbols that were generated.
trans-unit.target: 可以用textinput或textedited来代替,但那些只能回馈使用的键的最终结果,也就是说,你无法从中得到修改器本身,只能得到最终生成的符号。

trans-unit.source: One use for them is to pass new unnamed channels to other threads via Channel:push on a named channel.
trans-unit.target: 它们的一种用途是通过命名通道上的Channel：push将新的未命名通道传递给其他线程。

trans-unit.source: One use of this method can be to convert a screen-space mouse position into global world coordinates, if the given Transform has transformations applied that are used for a camera system in-game.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的Transform应用了游戏中摄像机系统的变换,那么该方法的一个用途是将屏幕空间的鼠标位置转换为全局世界坐标。

trans-unit.source: Only collide with category 6
Only usable in Canvases. The high dynamic range texture format: floating point 16 bits per channel (64 bpp) RGBA. Color channel values inside the Canvas range from -infinity to +infinity.
trans-unit.target: 只能在Canvases中使用。高动态范围纹理格式:浮点每通道16位(64 bpp)RGBA。Canvas内的颜色通道值范围为-无穷大到+无穷大。

trans-unit.source: Only used for Cubemap-type Canvases. The cube face index to render to (between 1 and 6)
trans-unit.target: 仅用于Cubemap类型的Canvas。要渲染到的多维数据集面索引（介于1和6之间）

trans-unit.source: Only used for Volume and Array-type Canvases. For Array textures this is the array layer to render to. For volume textures this is the depth slice.
trans-unit.target: 仅用于体积和阵列类型的画布。对于阵列纹理，这是要渲染到的阵列层。对于体积纹理，这是深度切片。
